title: Bride and Groom
description:
The young Dr. Bancroft has unsuccessfully been trying to establish his practice. Thus, a scheme to make him seem like a very busy doctor is devised in order to impress his bride who is coming for a visit. With a fake doctor, robbers, and a cast of colorful characters, plenty of entertaining shenanigans occur. But the real question is will the bride and groom get married despite it all? - Summary by Jenn Broda

Cast List:
Dr. Ray Bancroft- The groom, a young M.D.: Beeswaxcandle Judge Andy Dusenberry- A jolly old bachelor: Greg Giordano Jerry Cronin- A young Irish butler: Tomas Peter Sad-eyed Wallace- Wanted by the police: Alan Mapstone Officer Henn- Laying for Wallace: Larry Wilson Chloe Tollerton- The bride, with a mind of her own: Stacey Malcolm Miss Eudora Dodge- A wealthy maiden lady: mleigh Kathleen Cronin- A young wife: April6090 Emmaline Diggs- Aged 10, full of mischief: Lindsay Ann Cameron Maggie- The doctor's hired girl: Jenn Broda Stage Directions: Agnes Robert Behr
